name: Q-Pop (itch)
description:
Develop your species on a foreign planet!

This game is a remake of the original Q-Pop game, released in Germany in 1995 by von Wendt Konzept GmbH. This remake should be as close as possible to the original game with some added convenience functions.

There is an in-game tutorial to explain the basics. For a more thorough explanation, please have a look at the manual. There is also a German version of the manual.

The text was translated to English, but some graphics still show the original German text. These remaining German texts are in no way relevant for the game.
